text.section: The Authority may execute and perform a bid bond, performance bond, and payment bond as a surety for the benefit of a principal in connection with a contract financed by the federal government or a state government, a local government, a private entity, or a utility regulated by the Public Service Commission.

section.section: This subsection does not apply if the sources of funding for the bonds are grants.
The bonds may not exceed $1,000,000 each.

text.section: Bonds are subject to the approval of the Authority based on the bond worthiness of the principal.
